          \DNparagraph{%
            CPUSET{ }is{ }a{ }module{ }integrated{ }in{ }the{ }Linux{ }kernel{ }since{ }2.6.x.{ }In{ }the{ }kernel{ }documentation{,}{ }you{ }can{ }read:%
          }%
          \Dauxiliaryspace%
          \renewcommand{\Dparent}{section}%
          \DNliteralblock{%
            \Dattr{}{xml:space}{preserve}{literalblock}{%
            Cpusets~provide~a~mechanism~for~assigning~a~set~of~CPUs~and~Memory\mbox{}\\Nodes~to~a~set~of~tasks.\mbox{}\\\mbox{}\\Cpusets~constrain~the~CPU~and~Memory~placement~of~tasks~to~only\mbox{}\\the~resources~within~a~tasks~current~cpuset.~~They~form~a~nested\mbox{}\\hierarchy~visible~in~a~virtual~file~system.~~These~are~the~essential\mbox{}\\hooks{,}~beyond~what~is~already~present{,}~required~to~manage~dynamic\mbox{}\\job~placement~on~large~systems.\mbox{}\\\mbox{}\\Each~task~has~a~pointer~to~a~cpuset.~~Multiple~tasks~may~reference\mbox{}\\the~same~cpuset.~~Requests~by~a~task{,}~using~the~sched{\Dtextunderscore}setaffinity(2)\mbox{}\\system~call~to~include~CPUs~in~its~CPU~affinity~mask{,}~and~using~the\mbox{}\\mbind(2)~and~set{\Dtextunderscore}mempolicy(2)~system~calls~to~include~Memory~Nodes\mbox{}\\in~its~memory~policy{,}~are~both~filtered~through~that~tasks~cpuset{,}\mbox{}\\filtering~out~any~CPUs~or~Memory~Nodes~not~in~that~cpuset.~~The\mbox{}\\scheduler~will~not~schedule~a~task~on~a~CPU~that~is~not~allowed~in\mbox{}\\its~cpus{\Dtextunderscore}allowed~vector{,}~and~the~kernel~page~allocator~will~not\mbox{}\\allocate~a~page~on~a~node~that~is~not~allowed~in~the~requesting~tasks\mbox{}\\mems{\Dtextunderscore}allowed~vector.\mbox{}\\\mbox{}\\If~a~cpuset~is~cpu~or~mem~exclusive{,}~no~other~cpuset{,}~other~than~a~direct\mbox{}\\ancestor~or~descendent{,}~may~share~any~of~the~same~CPUs~or~Memory~Nodes.\mbox{}\\A~cpuset~that~is~cpu~exclusive~has~a~sched~domain~associated~with~it.\mbox{}\\The~sched~domain~consists~of~all~cpus~in~the~current~cpuset~that~are~not\mbox{}\\part~of~any~exclusive~child~cpusets.\mbox{}\\This~ensures~that~the~scheduler~load~balacing~code~only~balances\mbox{}\\against~the~cpus~that~are~in~the~sched~domain~as~defined~above~and~not\mbox{}\\all~of~the~cpus~in~the~system.~This~removes~any~overhead~due~to\mbox{}\\load~balancing~code~trying~to~pull~tasks~outside~of~the~cpu~exclusive\mbox{}\\cpuset~only~to~be~prevented~by~the~tasks{{\Dtextliteralsinglequote}}~cpus{\Dtextunderscore}allowed~mask.\mbox{}\\\mbox{}\\A~cpuset~that~is~mem{\Dtextunderscore}exclusive~restricts~kernel~allocations~for\mbox{}\\page{,}~buffer~and~other~data~commonly~shared~by~the~kernel~across\mbox{}\\multiple~users.~~All~cpusets{,}~whether~mem{\Dtextunderscore}exclusive~or~not{,}~restrict\mbox{}\\allocations~of~memory~for~user~space.~~This~enables~configuring~a\mbox{}\\system~so~that~several~independent~jobs~can~share~common~kernel\mbox{}\\data{,}~such~as~file~system~pages{,}~while~isolating~each~jobs~user\mbox{}\\allocation~in~its~own~cpuset.~~To~do~this{,}~construct~a~large\mbox{}\\mem{\Dtextunderscore}exclusive~cpuset~to~hold~all~the~jobs{,}~and~construct~child{,}\mbox{}\\non{\mbox{-}}mem{\Dtextunderscore}exclusive~cpusets~for~each~individual~job.~~Only~a~small\mbox{}\\amount~of~typical~kernel~memory{,}~such~as~requests~from~interrupt\mbox{}\\handlers{,}~is~allowed~to~be~taken~outside~even~a~mem{\Dtextunderscore}exclusive~cpuset.\mbox{}\\\mbox{}\\User~level~code~may~create~and~destroy~cpusets~by~name~in~the~cpuset\mbox{}\\virtual~file~system{,}~manage~the~attributes~and~permissions~of~these\mbox{}\\cpusets~and~which~CPUs~and~Memory~Nodes~are~assigned~to~each~cpuset{,}\mbox{}\\specify~and~query~to~which~cpuset~a~task~is~assigned{,}~and~list~the\mbox{}\\task~pids~assigned~to~a~cpuset.%
          }}%

            A{ }job{ }is{ }defined{ }by{ }needed{ }resources{ }and{ }a{ }script/program{ }to{ }run.{ }So{,}{ }the{ }user{ }must{ }specify{ }how{ }many{ }resources{ }and{ }what{ }kind{ }of{ }them{ }are{ }needed{ }by{ }his{ }application.{ }Thus{,}{ }OAR{ }system{ }will{ }give{ }him{ }or{ }not{ }what{ }he{ }wants{ }and{ }will{ }control{ }the{ }execution.{ }When{ }a{ }job{ }is{ }launched{,}{ }OAR{ }executes{ }user{ }program{ }only{ }on{ }the{ }first{ }reservation{ }node.{ }So{ }this{ }program{ }can{ }access{ }some{ }environment{ }variables{ }to{ }know{ }its{ }environment:%

          {\mbox{-}}I{,}~{\mbox{-}}{\mbox{-}}interactive~~~~~~~~~~~~~Request~an~interactive~job.~Open~a~login~shell\mbox{}\\~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~on~the~first~node~of~the~reservation~instead~of\mbox{}\\~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~running~a~script.\mbox{}\\{\mbox{-}}C{,}~{\mbox{-}}{\mbox{-}}connect={\textless}job~id{\textgreater}~~~~~~~~Connect~to~a~running~job\mbox{}\\{\mbox{-}}l{,}~{\mbox{-}}{\mbox{-}}resource={\textless}list{\textgreater}~~~~~~~~~Set~the~requested~resources~for~the~job.\mbox{}\\~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~The~different~parameters~are~resource~properties\mbox{}\\~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~registered~in~OAR~database{,}~and~{`}walltime{{\Dtextliteralsinglequote}}~which\mbox{}\\~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~specifies~the~duration~before~the~job~must~be\mbox{}\\~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~automatically~terminated~if~still~running.\mbox{}\\~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~Walltime~format~is~{[}hour:mn:sec{\textbar}hour:mn{\textbar}hour{]}.\mbox{}\\~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~Ex:~nodes=4/cpu=1{,}walltime=2:00:00\mbox{}\\{\mbox{-}}S{,}~{\mbox{-}}{\mbox{-}}scanscript~~~~~~~~~~~~~~Batch~mode~only:~asks~oarsub~to~scan~the~given\mbox{}\\~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~script~for~OAR~directives~({\#}OAR~{\mbox{-}}l~...)\mbox{}\\{\mbox{-}}q{,}~{\mbox{-}}{\mbox{-}}queue={\textless}queue{\textgreater}~~~~~~~~~~~Set~the~queue~to~submit~the~job~to\mbox{}\\{\mbox{-}}p{,}~{\mbox{-}}{\mbox{-}}property={"}{\textless}list{\textgreater}{"}~~~~~~~Add~constraints~to~properties~for~the~job.\mbox{}\\~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~(format~is~a~WHERE~clause~from~the~SQL~syntax)\mbox{}\\{\mbox{-}}r{,}~{\mbox{-}}{\mbox{-}}reservation={\textless}date{\textgreater}~~~~~~Request~a~job~start~time~reservation{,}\mbox{}\\~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~instead~of~a~submission.\mbox{}\\~~~~{\mbox{-}}{\mbox{-}}checkpoint={\textless}delay{\textgreater}~~~~~~Enable~the~checkpointing~for~the~job.~A~signal\mbox{}\\~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~is~sent~DELAY~seconds~before~the~walltime~on\mbox{}\\~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~the~first~processus~of~the~job\mbox{}\\~~~~{\mbox{-}}{\mbox{-}}signal={\textless}{\#}sig{\textgreater}~~~~~~~~~~~Specify~the~signal~to~use~when~checkpointing\mbox{}\\~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~Use~signal~numbers{,}~default~is~12~(SIGUSR2)\mbox{}\\{\mbox{-}}t{,}~{\mbox{-}}{\mbox{-}}type={\textless}type{\textgreater}~~~~~~~~~~~~~Specify~a~specific~type~(deploy{,}~besteffort{,}\mbox{}\\~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~cosystem{,}~checkpoint{,}~timesharing)\mbox{}\\{\mbox{-}}d{,}~{\mbox{-}}{\mbox{-}}directory={\textless}dir{\textgreater}~~~~~~~~~Specify~the~directory~where~to~launch~the\mbox{}\\~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~command~(default~is~current~directory)\mbox{}\\~~~~{\mbox{-}}{\mbox{-}}project={\textless}txt{\textgreater}~~~~~~~~~~~Specify~a~name~of~a~project~the~job~belongs~to\mbox{}\\{\mbox{-}}n{,}~{\mbox{-}}{\mbox{-}}name={\textless}txt{\textgreater}~~~~~~~~~~~~~~Specify~an~arbitrary~name~for~the~job\mbox{}\\{\mbox{-}}a{,}~{\mbox{-}}{\mbox{-}}anterior={\textless}job~id{\textgreater}~~~~~~~Anterior~job~that~must~be~terminated~to~start\mbox{}\\~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~this~new~one\mbox{}\\~~~~{\mbox{-}}{\mbox{-}}notify={\textless}txt{\textgreater}~~~~~~~~~~~~Specify~a~notification~method\mbox{}\\~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~(mail~or~command~to~execute).~Ex:\mbox{}\\~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~{\mbox{-}}{\mbox{-}}notify~{"}mail:name{\textbackslash}@domain.com{"}\mbox{}\\~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~{\mbox{-}}{\mbox{-}}notify~{"}exec:/path/to/script~args{"}\mbox{}\\~~~~{\mbox{-}}{\mbox{-}}resubmit={\textless}job~id{\textgreater}~~~~~~~Resubmit~the~given~job~as~a~new~one\mbox{}\\{\mbox{-}}k{,}~{\mbox{-}}{\mbox{-}}use{\mbox{-}}job{\mbox{-}}key~~~~~~~~~~~~~Activate~the~job{\mbox{-}}key~mechanism.\mbox{}\\{\mbox{-}}i{,}~{\mbox{-}}{\mbox{-}}import{\mbox{-}}job{\mbox{-}}key{\mbox{-}}from{\mbox{-}}file={\textless}file{\textgreater}\mbox{}\\~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~Import~the~job{\mbox{-}}key~to~use~from~a~files~instead\mbox{}\\~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~of~generating~a~new~one.\mbox{}\\~~~~{\mbox{-}}{\mbox{-}}import{\mbox{-}}job{\mbox{-}}key{\mbox{-}}inline={\textless}txt{\textgreater}\mbox{}\\~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~Import~the~job{\mbox{-}}key~to~use~inline~instead~of\mbox{}\\~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~generating~a~new~one.\mbox{}\\{\mbox{-}}e~~{\mbox{-}}{\mbox{-}}export{\mbox{-}}job{\mbox{-}}key{\mbox{-}}to{\mbox{-}}file={\textless}file{\textgreater}\mbox{}\\~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~Export~the~job~key~to~a~file.~Warning:~the\mbox{}\\~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~file~will~be~overwritten~if~it~already~exists.\mbox{}\\~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~(the~{\%}jobid{\%}~pattern~is~automatically~replaced)\mbox{}\\{\mbox{-}}O~~{\mbox{-}}{\mbox{-}}stdout={\textless}file{\textgreater}~~~~~~~~~~~Specify~the~file~that~will~store~the~standart\mbox{}\\~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~output~stream~of~the~job.\mbox{}\\~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~(the~{\%}jobid{\%}~pattern~is~automatically~replaced)\mbox{}\\{\mbox{-}}E~~{\mbox{-}}{\mbox{-}}stderr={\textless}file{\textgreater}~~~~~~~~~~~Specify~the~file~that~will~store~the~standart\mbox{}\\~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~error~stream~of~the~job.\mbox{}\\~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~(the~{\%}jobid{\%}~pattern~is~automatically~replaced)\mbox{}\\~~~~{\mbox{-}}{\mbox{-}}hold~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~Set~the~job~state~into~Hold~instead~of~Waiting{,}\mbox{}\\~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~so~that~it~is~not~scheduled~(you~must~run\mbox{}\\~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~{"}oarresume{"}~to~turn~it~into~the~Waiting~state)\mbox{}\\{\mbox{-}}s{,}~{\mbox{-}}{\mbox{-}}stagein={\textless}dir{\textbar}tgz{\textgreater}~~~~~~~Set~the~stagein~directory~or~archive\mbox{}\\~~~~{\mbox{-}}{\mbox{-}}stagein{\mbox{-}}md5sum={\textless}md5sum{\textgreater}~Set~the~stagein~file~md5sum\mbox{}\\{\mbox{-}}D{,}~{\mbox{-}}{\mbox{-}}dumper~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~Print~result~in~DUMPER~format\mbox{}\\{\mbox{-}}X{,}~{\mbox{-}}{\mbox{-}}xml~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~Print~result~in~XML~format\mbox{}\\{\mbox{-}}Y{,}~{\mbox{-}}{\mbox{-}}yaml~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~Print~result~in~YAML~format\mbox{}\\{\mbox{-}}h{,}~{\mbox{-}}{\mbox{-}}help~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~Print~this~help~message\mbox{}\\{\mbox{-}}V{,}~{\mbox{-}}{\mbox{-}}version~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~Print~OAR~version~number%
